oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of property taken by Federal army
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James Robards Taylor recorded in a family business ledger "the property that was taking from me for the use of the Federal Army." He listed 12 head of horses and 2 mules for $2,000, 1 large "yoak" of ox $100, 1 fine Durham cow $50, 2 other cattle $30, 21 fat hogs $420, 16 fat shoats $40. 15 sheep $30, 300 barrels of corn $150, 3,000 bundles of fodder $90, 1 new saddle $25, and 19 negroes $15,000 for a total of $17,930.
